body_html:
In the tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj I found the following command:
C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy D:/opencv/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py D:/opencv/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/

But it doesn't look like the file was copied
So I copied it manually and did:
python setup.py bdist_wheel

Which generated a wheel that I installed with pip install sucessfully
But then when I try to import tensorflow it gives me the same error message

Any ideas?

body:
In the tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj I found the following command:
C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy D:/opencv/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py D:/opencv/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/

But it doesn't look like the file was copied
So I copied it manually and did:
python setup.py bdist_wheel

Which generated a wheel that I installed with pip install sucessfully
But then when I try to import tensorflow it gives me the same error message

Any ideas?
